    • Uses of PlayerStats in com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries.interfaces

      Methods in com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries.interfaces with parameters of type PlayerStats 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int CharCreationLibrary.getTotalBonusStatPoints(PlayerStats playerStats, PlayerAccount account)
      Based on the rules of the system, this method returns the number of bonus stat points available to players to allocate, if the system lets them do such a thing.
      void AchievementLibrary.loadPlayerSkillAwards(Tattooable mob, PlayerStats stats)
      When a player is loaded, this method inspects their tattoos for any past achievements and, if found, loads the playerstats with trackable skill and expertises mappings, allowing them to receive those awards when the time is right.
